item.title: 特朗普 "解放日 "前的八点思考
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 天桥》的新人工智能用更具凝聚力的视频挑战 OpenAI 的 Sora
item.description: Runway AI 公司推出了一种新的人工智能模型，旨在让用户制作出人物、物体和背景一致的视频，这标志着在利用计算机更快、更廉价地制作电影的竞赛中可能实现的飞跃。【原文：A new artificial intelligence model from Runway AI Inc. aims to let users create videos with consistent characters, objects and backgrounds, marking a possible leap ahead in the race to use computers to make films more quickly and inexpensively.】

item.title: 追逐价值的交易者推动巴西股市逃离美国
item.description: 随着投资者从动荡的美国市场撤退，到其他地方寻找廉价股票，巴西股市即将迎来自 2022 年以来最好的第一季度。【原文：Brazilian stocks are closing in on their best first quarter since 2022 as investors retreating from a volatile US market seek cheap equities elsewhere.】

item.title: ETF 基金大爆发，2025 年有望新增 1,000 只基金
item.description: 今年的头条新闻和股市暴跌几乎没有减缓 ETF 行业的发展。【原文：This year’s whiplash headlines and thrashing in equity markets have done little to slow down the ETF industry.】

item.title: 在秘鲁 "非法 "铜矿繁荣之际，MMG 试图让投资者放心
item.description: 中资金属生产商五矿集团有限公司（MMG Ltd.）试图向投资者保证其在秘鲁的发展前景，称该国激增的 "非法 "采矿活动并未影响其铜矿生产或发展计划。【原文：Chinese-owned metals producer MMG Ltd. attempted to reassure investors about its prospects in Peru, saying a surge in “illegal” mining activity in the country isn’t affecting its copper production or development plans.】

item.title: 德意志银行称固特异是特朗普关税战的赢家
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）将这家轮胎销售商的评级从 "持有 "上调至 "买入"，认为固特异轮胎橡胶公司可能是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布的汽车进口关税的相对赢家，因为该公司在美国的大部分需求来自国内制造商，而轮胎不在计划征收的关税之列，至少目前如此。【原文：Goodyear Tire & Rubber Co. could be a relative winner from President Donald Trump’s announced tariffs on car imports as most of its US demand is from domestic manufacturers and tires aren’t included in the planned levies, at least for now, according to Deutsche Bank, which upgraded the tire seller to buy from hold.】

item.title: 股市跌势加剧，交易员关注不祥技术水平
item.description: 随着市场对贸易不确定性和经济增长放缓的担忧日益加剧，股市溃败的趋势愈演愈烈，股市交易员正密切关注一些关键技术图表，以了解市场下一步的走向。【原文：Stock market traders have their eyes glued to some key technical charts to get a sense of where the market is headed next as the equities rout becomes increasingly intense over fears of trade uncertainty and slowing economic growth.】

item.title: 波兰股票是欧洲历史性增长的突出赢家
item.description: 波兰股市将在第一季度成为欧洲表现最好的股市，即使邻国乌克兰迅速达成和平协议的预期破灭，股息的大幅增长也会让投资者保持关注。【原文：Polish stocks are set to be Europe’s best performers in the first quarter, with a big boost in dividends keeping investors engaged even as expectations for a quick peace deal in neighboring Ukraine fizzle.】

item.title: 南非计划成立公司管理 84 亿美元国有资产
item.description: 40 岁的南非公共工程部长迪安-麦克弗森（Dean Macpherson）表示，他计划成立一家国有公司，负责管理政府的房地产投资组合，并吸引私人投资进入基础设施项目。【原文：South Africa’s Public Works Minister Dean Macpherson, 40, said he plans to create a state-owned company that will manage the government’s real estate portfolio and entice private investment into infrastructure projects.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 Cerebras 称美国在首次公开募股前同意与阿联酋建立联系
item.description: Cerebras Systems 公司表示，该公司已与美国外国投资委员会解决了 "所有未决问题"，这一关键步骤可能会为这家芯片初创公司备受瞩目的首次公开募股扫清障碍。【原文：Cerebras Systems Inc. said it has resolved “all open issues” with the Committee on Foreign Investment in the US, a crucial step that may clear the chip startup’s path for its much-anticipated initial public offering.】

item.title: 德国家庭购物公司 HSE 与债权人达成协议
item.description: 德国零售商 Home Shopping Europe GmbH 与债权人达成协议，对公司进行资本重组并延长债券到期日，此后该公司债券上涨。【原文：German retailer Home Shopping Europe GmbH bonds rose after it reached an agreement with its creditors to re-capitalize the firm and extend its bond maturities.】

item.title: 卡尼誓言重振加拿大战时住宅建设战略
item.description: 自由党领袖马克.卡尼（Mark Carney）承诺，他的政府将通过一项新的住房计划重新投入到住房建设事业中，他将该计划称为加拿大自二战以来最雄心勃勃的计划。【原文：Liberal Leader Mark Carney promised his government would get back in the business of homebuilding with a new housing plan he’s pitching as Canada’s most ambitious since World War II.】

item.title: 加密货币暴跌，Coinbase 股价迎来自 FTX 崩溃以来最差季度
item.description: 由于对美国经济的担忧日益加重，数字资产受到冲击，Coinbase Global Inc.【原文：Shares of Coinbase Global Inc. and other firms linked to cryptocurrencies have been hammered this quarter as growing concerns about the US economy weigh on digital assets.】

item.title: 关税威胁加剧，橡树树计划设立特殊情况基金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management LP）正在为其专注于企业特殊情况的最新基金寻找投资者，因为全球贸易战使企业前景暗淡。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management LP is seeking investors for its latest fund focusing on corporate special situations, according to people familiar with the matter, as a global trade war darkens the outlook for businesses.】

item.title: 财政部长称赞比亚通胀终于达到顶峰
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长表示，在痛苦的债务重组和历史性干旱导致物价飞涨之后，赞比亚的通货膨胀终于达到了顶峰。【原文：Zambia’s inflation has finally peaked, the southern African nation’s finance minister said, after a painful debt restructuring and historic drought sent prices soaring.】

item.title: 沙特贾米尔汽车公司和长安汽车计划进军南非市场
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯汽车经销商贾米尔汽车公司（Jameel Motors）和中国重庆长安汽车股份有限公司（Chongqing Changan Automobile Co.【原文：Saudi Arabian auto distributor Jameel Motors and China’s Chongqing Changan Automobile Co. plan to enter the South African market later this year as the continent’s biggest economy shows signs of recovery.】

item.title: 瑞典克朗在创下 15 年来的最佳季度业绩后将迎来更多涨幅
item.description: 瑞典储蓄银行（SEB AB）和瑞典商业银行（Svenska Handelsbanken AB）表示，即使在经历了十五年来最好的一个季度之后，瑞典货币的涨势仍有上升空间。【原文：Even after the best quarter in a decade and a half, Sweden’s currency rally still has room to run, SEB AB and Svenska Handelsbanken AB say.】

item.title: 特朗普在华尔街引发经济恐慌，美股大幅下挫
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普总统下一步推出的关税措施将对全球经济造成冲击，周一美国股市溃败加剧，对经济衰退的担忧不断升温，导致 S&P 500 指数有望创下自 20 世纪 80 年代以来与世界其他地区相比最糟糕的一个季度。【原文：The US stock market rout intensified on Monday on fears that President Donald Trump’s next tariff rollout will deliver a shock to the global economy, with rising recession concerns leaving the S&P 500 Index on track for its worst quarter compared to the rest of the world since the 1980s.】

item.title: 地中海清洁燃料法规即将出台 柴油价格骤降
item.description: 一项旨在控制地中海地区船舶排放的环保规定正在使该地区的柴油价格飙升。【原文：An environmental rule designed to rein in emissions from ships in the Mediterranean is sending regional diesel prices into a spin.】

item.title: 需求低迷拖累市场，中国新房销售下滑
item.description: 中国 3 月份的住宅销售再次下滑，表明房地产行业的复苏依然乏力。【原文：China’s residential sales fell again in March, suggesting the recovery in the property sector remains frail.】

item.title: Northvolt 裁员 1700 人，作为破产程序的一部分
item.description: 破产的电池制造商 Northvolt AB 将继续在瑞典运营，员工人数为 1700 人，其余员工将被解雇。【原文：Bankrupt battery maker Northvolt AB will continue to operate in Sweden with a staff of 1,700 while its remaining employees will be laid off.】

item.title: 美国信贷风险指数显示本周关税逼近，恐慌情绪升温
item.description: 周一，由于关税威胁加剧了人们对经济放缓的担忧，股市下跌，衡量信贷风险的一个指标上升。【原文：A gauge of credit risk rose on Monday as looming tariffs stoked concerns of an economic slowdown and stock markets fell.】

item.title: Alphabet 的人工智能药物部门从 OpenAI 支持者处融资 6 亿美元
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下利用人工智能发现药物的公司 Isomorphic Labs 已筹集到 6 亿美元，这是该公司首次接受外部融资。【原文：Isomorphic Labs, the Alphabet Inc.-owned company that uses artificial intelligence to discover drugs, has raised $600 million, the first time it’s taken in external funding.】

item.title: 万科自 1991 年上市以来首次出现年度亏损
item.description: 中国万科集团（China Vanke Co., Ltd.）公布的去年亏损额达到了创纪录的 495 亿元人民币（68 亿美元），这也凸显了该开发商的家乡深圳为何要出面控制公司运营。【原文：China Vanke Co. reported a record 49.5 billion yuan ($6.8 billion) loss for last year, underscoring why the developer’s hometown of Shenzhen has stepped in to take control of operations.】

item.title: 美国银行股迎来自 2023 年恐慌情绪肆虐以来最糟糕的一季度
item.description: 受唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的贸易战引发的更广泛经济忧虑的影响，美国银行股有望出现自两年前地区性贷款机构倒闭引发危机担忧以来最严重的季度下滑。【原文：US bank stocks are on track for the worst quarterly slide since the collapse of regional lenders set off fears of a crisis two years ago, hit by the broader economic worries unleashed by President Donald Trump’s trade war.】

item.title: 奥地利认为赤字激增，欧盟预算谴责不可避免
item.description: 奥地利财政部长马库斯-马尔特鲍尔（Markus Marterbauer）表示，由于去年的经济发展情况比人们担心的更糟，奥地利将无法避免因赤字过大而受到欧盟的谴责。【原文：Austria won’t be able to avoid being reprimanded by the European Union for running an outsized deficit as last year’s economic developments were worse than feared, according to Finance Minister Markus Marterbauer.】

item.title: 价格飙升，北海石油掉期交易量创历史新高
item.description: 周五，随着油价跳涨，交易商用来对冲基准实物油价的掉期交易转手量创下历史新高，这促使市场人士认为，一家或多家交易商已被迫平仓大笔亏损头寸。【原文：A record volume of swaps that traders use to hedge benchmark physical oil prices changed hands on Friday as prices jumped, prompting market participants to suggest that one or more traders had been forced to close out big loss-making positions.】

item.title: 赛勒策略公司增购 19 亿美元比特币
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的战略公司买入了 19 亿美元的比特币，这是自 10 月下旬以来几乎每周都有的一系列加密货币收购中的最新一笔。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy bought $1.9 billion of Bitcoin, the latest in a series of almost weekly acquisitions of the cryptocurrency since late October.】

item.title: Sempra 探讨出售墨西哥天然气资产和少数液化天然气股权
item.description: Sempra 正在启动出售墨西哥天然气分销业务及其液化天然气业务少数股权的程序。【原文：Sempra is launching a process to sell natural gas distribution operations in Mexico and a minority stake in its liquefied natural gas business.】

item.title: 欧洲央行权衡下一步行动，德国物价增速超预期
item.description: 德国 3 月份的通胀放缓幅度超过预期，接近欧洲央行 2% 的目标。【原文：German inflation slowed more than anticipated in March, nearing the European Central Bank’s 2% target as officials ponder whether to lower interest rates again at their next meeting or pause.】
